alert.note: Alert for Clayton; DeKalb; Douglas; Fayette; Fulton; Henry; Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:56PM EDT until June 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rockdale County in north central Georgia... Southern DeKalb County in north central Georgia... Northern Fayette County in north central Georgia... Douglas County in north central Georgia... Northwestern Henry County in north central Georgia... Southwestern Fulton County in north central Georgia... Clayton County in north central Georgia... Northern Newton County in north central Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 655 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over the area. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, Fayetteville, Conyers, Covington, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, Villa Rica, College Park, Fairburn, Tyrone, Morrow, Hapeville, Palmetto and Lake City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; DeKalb; Douglas; Fayette; Fulton; Henry; Newton; Rockdale
